about_page.description1: Our goal is to highlight the products of our partners.
about_page.description2: Holding a raffle and winning freebies is a fantastic way to show a community that they are appreciated.
about_page.description3: The Raffle draw, the assurance of an open-ended competition.
about_page.description4: The principle of the draw is based on fairness: everyone has their chances, just perform the actions determined in the competition.
about_page.description6: Looking for new challenges? Join the Rafflee team and be part of the adventure.

faq_page.description1: Easily use our platform to incentivize new product giveaways, drive coupon downloads, drive email list signups or even allow customers to answer to a poll.
faq_page.answer1: Rafflee is a web and mobile platform that highlights corporate giveaways by influencers for their communities.
faq_page.question2: Does Rafflee work on my phone?
faq_page.answer2: Rafflee is available on iOS and Android for free.
faq_page.answer3: A giveaway is the act of winning a gift following a competition.
faq_page.question4: How is the raffle carried out?
faq_page.answer4: Each action performed earns points, some actions are required to participate. When the required conditions have been met, the user can confirm their participation. At the deadline, the draw is carried out by our in-house algorithm. Everyone has their chances. However, those who take the most actions are more likely to win. It is possible to enrich your participation to increase your chances of winning until the deadline before the draw.
faq_page.answer5: Yes, Rafflee is completely free for the user.
faq_page.question6: How do I register for Raffle?
faq_page.answer7: The data collected for the campaigns is anonymized. The only data communicated is your username to identify you in the event of victory. The phone number is used to confirm your registration. The address and telephone number are not communicated to third parties under any circumstances, these data are used only for sending giveaways and for confirming your registration.
faq_page.question8: How to participate in one of our quiz?
faq_page.answer8: To participate in our contests, depending on the campaign, there may or may not be mandatory actions to perform. Most often, these are actions such as: liking a page, liking a post, following a profile, watching a video, going to a website and many more. Each action earns several points. The higher the number of points, the more chances you have of winning.
faq_page.question9: How to create my giveaway campaign?
faq_page.answer9: as a brand or influencer. Companies have a specific account allowing them to manage data, campaigns and their networks.
faq_page.answer10: In the Dashboard, it is possible to create your own campaigns, select the giveaways to be won and the actions to be carried out (compulsory or not) to participate.
faq_page.answer11: Depending on the type of campaign selected, the draw can be done live or automatically.
faq_page.question12: What are the benefits of using Rafflee?
faq_page.answer12: Rafflee is the new communication channel for your digital strategy. It is a quick way to build your notoriety and experiment with new partnerships while measuring the scale of your campaigns on your social networks. Rafflee aims to enhance influencer marketing through its brand / influencer platform.

influencer_page.banner_description: Influencers can easily create campaigns that promote their content on social networks while ensuring legitimacy to their contests.

slider1.title: 1. The community:
slider1.text: By carrying out your campaigns with Rafflee you thank your followers by offering them the possibility of winning giveaways or raffles with fair play contests. In exchange, these will highlight your different content on different social networks. This will ensure better exposure (an increase in your followers on a social network for example) and the satisfaction of a thanked audience!

slider2.title: 2. The platform:
slider2.text: Rafflee provides the first growth marketing platform for contests and giveaways. Thanks to our in-house algorithm, we can assure you of a random draw which will give priority to rewarding the most motivated participants. We take care of providing you with as much data as possible (anonymized to protect users) in order to be able to analyze the impact of your campaign on social networks and with your audience.

slider3.title: 3. The commitment:
slider3.text: Thanks to the connection system with the various social networks, Rafflee guarantees you an exceptional engagement rate. Indeed, the inclusion of new participants in your campaigns is done only if the user has fulfilled all the conditions set beforehand when designing the campaign. Engage your community on your new social network, select the information to highlight by activating the desired actions for your community to participate.

slider4.title: 4. The security of a successful campaign:
slider4.text: With Rafflee, you ensure a successful and secure campaign. The algorithm draws at random the winners of your contests or your giveaways. This also ensures you a certain distribution of the prizes without cheating. In addition, we check the accuracy of the 'call to action' performed via the connection to the various networks.

tooltips.giveaway: This is a campaign where the maximum number of participants is not defined by the number of gifts to win (example: 10 giveaways, 100 participants, 10 winners)
tooltips.reward: This is a campaign where the maximum number of participants is equal to the number of giveaways to distribute (example: 10 giveaways, 10 participants maximum)
tooltips.live_draw: This option activates the âLiveâ part of the draw. When the campaign is over, it is possible for the promotion designer to carry out the raffle live.
tooltips.limit_participants: Allows, depending on the chosen campaign, to limit the maximum number of participants
tooltips.public: The promotion is open to everyone
tooltips.private: Promotion is limited to circle users
tooltips.facebook_post: This action allows you to select a facebook post from a page that the user must like, comment on or share.
tooltips.facebook_url: This action allows you to share the url of a post that the user will have to like and / or share.
tooltips.facebook_page: This action allows you to choose a Facebook page that the user will have to follow and / or share.
tooltips.twitter_like: This action allows you to select a tweet via its ID that the user will like.
tooltips.twitter_follow: This action allows you to select a tweeting account for the user to follow.
tooltips.twitter_tweet: This action allows you to select a tweet template for the user to tweet.
tooltips.twitter_retweet: This action allows you to select a tweet via its ID that the user should retweet.
tooltips.instagram_profile: This action allows you to select an Instagram account that the user should follow.
tooltips.instagram_publication: This action allows you to select an Instagram post that the user will like.
tooltips.twitch_follow: This action selects a twitch account for the user to follow.
tooltips.tiktok_profile: This action allows the selection of a tiktok profile for the user to follow.
tooltips.tiktok_publication: This action allows you to select a tiktok post that the user will like.
tooltips.video: This action allows you to select a video to be watched by the user.
tooltips.website: This action allows you to choose a site that should be visited by the user.
tooltips.user_points: Points are the accumulation of actions carried out on different campaigns, they will be used to participate in special campaigns or to obtain particular products.
tooltips.instagram_comment_is_in_progress: Your comment is in review, please check that your comment exists
